title: Archaeologist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Dig up the remains of a dead player during the day. You get a use of their ability. This can only be used once per player.
- During the day, dig up the remains of previous games. You get a random ability from a random role in the game.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can multitask during the night, but not during the day.
- You can only select completed games. For Game 7, both subgames count towards Game 7.

desc:
Post 2707B
translated and put into my format
